About

I am a freshman student at St. Bonaventure University currently studying Computer Science.

I want to become a software engineer to be able to continuously learn and grow in my career, as well as some of the flexibilities offered by such a role.

Around the Web

About Freelancer

Freelance is a free to use, MIT licensed Bootstrap theme created by Start Bootstrap .

Copyright © Your Website 2023

Bona 101

Teaches students helpful study skills and effective ways to navigate Freshman year. It also teaches students about diversity and community as well as Bonaventure ideals.

The Beauty and Joy of Computer Science

This course is about the history, principles, implications and future of computing. It teaches students some of the risks and benefits of computing and some ways it effects our lives

Introduction to Writing

A composition writing course that teaches grammatical properties and styles, structure, and content generating.

Introduction to Sociology

Analyzing the history of different cultures and the morals, beliefs, and practices that go along with them, as well as how it relates to the behaviors of their society.

Beauty and Joy of Computer Science Lab

Learning how to code in a visual programming language called Snap! Allows students to learn the basics of programming in a simple way.

Introduction to Ethics

Gives insight into historical philosophers and their beliefs, as well as what they theorized. Teaches how to theorize and analyze philosophers work and draw conclusions from it.
